overview_of_class: Thermodynamics and kinetics of electrochemical processes. Materials for fuel cells, batteries, and electrochemical capacitors, including electrolytes and electrodes. Electrical and mass transport. Effect of microstructure. Electrochemical characterization. Device configurations.
name: Electrochemical Energy Materials and Devices
title: MEAS MAT_SCI 382-0-20 Electrochemical Energy Materials and Devices

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Thermodynamics and kinetics of electrochemical processes. Materials for fuel cells, batteries, and electrochemical capacitors, including electrolytes and electrodes. Electrical and mass transport. Effect of microstructure. Electrochemical characterization. Device configurations.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Required: Fuel Cell Fundamentals, 2nd edition, 2009
Ryan P O'Hayre, et al
Wiley publishers
ISBN: 978-0-470-25843-9


Lecture notes will also be made available.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value: Suggested: Robert A Huggins, Advanced Batteries: Materials Science Aspects, Springer (2009) ISBN: 978-0-387-76423-8

subject: MAT_SCI
